content: **drops crochet teddy** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size approx 13 cm / 5 tall materials drops muskat from garnstudio the teddy weighs less than 50 g use remains and choose colors of your own choice see picture for suggestions drops crochet hook size 4mm/us g accessories poly stuffing for filling **pattern in french** here 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=28
